verbs.description: [ARG0: i] [V: knew] [ARG1: there was more to life than all those guys blogging about stoicism a new study compares a typically stoic response to stress suppressing emotion while searching for a solution to the power of generating endogenous emotion thinking good thoughts or buffering with positive emotion both were useful stoicism]
